subtitle: This cheesecake may be served warm or cold.

method.text: Melt butter and syrup together in a pan. Stir in biscuit crumbs and mix until butter has been absorbed. Press into a 22 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm / 9 inch loose-based flan dish or cake tin. Allow to cool.
Sieve the cottage cheese into a bowl. Stir in the sugar and egg yolks. Whip the cream until soft peaks form. Fold into the cheese mixture with the cold pureed apple, the cinnamon and sultanas.
Whisk the egg whites until stiff enough to stand In peaks. Fold in using a metal spoon.
Pour mixture onto biscuit base. Bake for 50-60 min or until golden brown and set. Allow to cool.

Arrange 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm / 1 inch strips of greaseproof paper across the cheesecake leaving gaps between each. Sieve icing sugar over the uncovered areas. Remove paper. Arrange apple slices around the edge. Serve warm or cold.

title: Spiced apple cheesecake
